name: lusciously
content:
lusciously adverb
(TASTE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is pleasantly sweet or contains a lot of juice: We had a lusciously creamy risotto. A large, lusciously ripe mango made a delicious breakfast.
More examplesFewer examplesThe sorbet is lusciously smooth.The meat was lusciously juicy and flavorsome.Grocery store tomatoes are often pale facsimiles of the lusciously sweet ones picked off the vine right before dinner.
